success.page_content: You have passed the quiz by answering all five questions correctly

failure_initial.page_content: Please read our <riskWarningModalTag>Risk Warnings</riskWarningModalTag> to refresh your knowledge of investing risks. If you fail again, you'll be locked out for 24 hours.

failure_repeat.description: The FCA requires us to prevent you from retaking the test until 24 hours have passed.

retake_quiz_text: Retake the quiz when you're ready.
retake_quiz_text_24_hours: We look forward to seeing you back here in 24 hours, when you can retake the quiz.
risk_warning_info: In the meantime, make sure you’re prepared by <riskWarningModalTag>reading over our Risk Warnings</riskWarningModalTag>.
